Package logic

Class CollisionLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.CollisionLogic
  • public class CollisionLogic
extends java.lang.Object
    All static class that contains various methods for detecting collisions between objects

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static java.util.ArrayList<MapObject> blocks  
      private static Player[] players  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CollisionLogic()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static boolean collided​(ObjectData object1Data, ObjectData object2Data)
      Checks whether or not the reference object (object1) has collided on any of the 4 sides with object 2 Takes the 2 objects' objectDatas and returns true or false (whether object 1 collided with object 2 or not)
      static boolean collidedBottom​(ObjectData object1Data, ObjectData object2Data)
      Checks whether or not the reference object (object1) has collided on the bottom side with object 2 Takes the 2 objects' objectDatas and returns true or false (whether object 1 collided bottom with object 2 or not)
      static boolean collidedBottomWithBlock​(ObjectData objectData)
      Checks whether or not the object has collided on the bottom with any block on the map Takes the objectData of the object as a parameter and returns true or false (whether or not it has collided on the bottom with any block)
      static boolean collidedBottomWithPlayer​(ObjectData objectData, boolean player1or2)
      Checks whether or not this player has collided bottom with the other player Takes this player's object data and whether this player is player 1 or 2 and returns true or false (collided bottom or not)
      static boolean collidedLeft​(ObjectData object1Data, ObjectData object2Data)
      Checks whether or not the reference object (object1) has collided on its left side with object 2 Takes the 2 objects' objectDatas and returns true or false (whether object 1 collided left with object 2 or not)
      static boolean collidedLeftWithBlock​(ObjectData objectData)
      Checks whether or not the object has collided on its left side with any block on the map Takes the objectData of the object as a parameter and returns true or false (whether or not it has collided on the left with any block)
      static boolean collidedRight​(ObjectData object1Data, ObjectData object2Data)
      Checks whether or not the reference object (object1) has collided on its right side with object 2 Takes the 2 objects' objectDatas and returns true or false (whether object 1 collided right with object 2 or not)
      static boolean collidedRightWithBlock​(ObjectData objectData)
      Checks whether or not the object has collided on its right side with any block on the map Takes the objectData of the object as a parameter and returns true or false (whether or not it has collided on the right with any block)
      static boolean collidedTop​(ObjectData object1Data, ObjectData object2Data)
      Checks whether or not the reference object (object1) has collided on the top side with object 2 Takes the 2 objects' objectDatas and returns true or false (whether object 1 collided top with object 2 or not)
      static boolean collidedTopWithBlock​(ObjectData objectData)
      Checks whether or not the object has collided on the top with any block on the map Takes the objectData of the object as a parameter and returns true or false (whether or not it has collided on the top with any block)
      static boolean collidedTopWithPlayer​(ObjectData objectData, boolean player1or2)
      Checks whether or not this player has collided top with the other player Takes this player's object data and whether this player is player 1 or 2 and returns true or false (collided top or not)
      static boolean collidedWithBlock​(ObjectData objectData)
      Checks whether or not the object has collided on any side with any of the blocks on the map Takes the objectData of the object as a parameter and returns true or false (whether or not it has collided with any block)
      private static boolean intersectsOnHorizontalPlane​(ObjectData object1Data, ObjectData object2Data)
      Checks whether 2 objects intersect on the same horizontal plane (if you move the objects horizontally they would meet each other) takes the objectDatas of the 2 objects and returns true or false (whether they intersect on the same horizontal plane or not)
      private static boolean intersectsOnVerticalPlane​(ObjectData object1Data, ObjectData object2Data)
      Checks whether 2 objects intersect on the same vertical plane (if you move the objects vertically they would meet each other) takes the objectDatas of the 2 objects and returns true or false (whether they intersect on the same vertical plane or not)
      static void setBlocks​(java.util.ArrayList<MapObject> blocks)
      Sets the blocks array for when a new map is generated
      static void setPlayers​(Player[] players)
      Sets the blocks array for when a new map is generated
      static float willCollideHorizontallyWithBlock​(MovingDirectionalMapObject object)
      Checks whether or not a MovingDirectionalMapObject will collide horizontally with any block on the map within the next frame (between its current position and its current position + velocity) Takes the moving object as a parameter and returns the x velocity it must move within the next frame in order to not clip into or through a block.
      static float willCollideHorizontallyWithObject​(MovingDirectionalMapObject object)
      Checks whether or not a MovingDirectionalMapObject will collide horizontally with either of the players or blocks on the map within the next frame (between its current position and its current position + velocity) Takes the moving object as a parameter and returns the x velocity it must move within the next frame in order to not clip into or through a player or block.
      static float willCollideHorizontallyWithPlayer​(MovingDirectionalMapObject object)
      Checks whether or not a MovingDirectionalMapObject will collide horizontally with either of the players on the map within the next frame (between its current position and its current position + velocity) Takes the moving object as a parameter and returns the x velocity it must move within the next frame in order to not clip into or through a player.
      static float willCollideVerticallyWithBlock​(MovingDirectionalMapObject object)
      Checks whether or not a MovingDirectionalMapObject will collide vertically with any block on the map within the next frame (between its current position and its current position + velocity) Takes the moving object as a parameter and returns the y velocity it must move within the next frame in order to not clip into or through a block.
      static float willCollideVerticallyWithObject​(MovingDirectionalMapObject object)
      Checks whether or not a MovingDirectionalMapObject will collide vertically with either of the players or blocks on the map within the next frame (between its current position and its current position + velocity)
      static float willCollideVerticallyWithPlayer​(MovingDirectionalMapObject object)
      Checks whether or not a MovingDirectionalMapObject will collide vertically with either of the players on the map within the next frame (between its current position and its current position + velocity) Takes the moving object as a parameter and returns the y velocity it must move within the next frame in order to not clip into or through a player.

      • willCollideHorizontallyWithBlock

        public static float willCollideHorizontallyWithBlock​(MovingDirectionalMapObject object)
        Checks whether or not a MovingDirectionalMapObject will collide horizontally with any block on the map within the next frame (between its current position and its current position + velocity) Takes the moving object as a parameter and returns the x velocity it must move within the next frame in order to not clip into or through a block. If, within the next frame, the moving directional map object will not collide with any block, its regular velocity is returned.

      • willCollideHorizontallyWithPlayer

        public static float willCollideHorizontallyWithPlayer​(MovingDirectionalMapObject object)
        Checks whether or not a MovingDirectionalMapObject will collide horizontally with either of the players on the map within the next frame (between its current position and its current position + velocity) Takes the moving object as a parameter and returns the x velocity it must move within the next frame in order to not clip into or through a player. If, within the next frame, the moving directional map object will not collide with either player, its regular velocity is returned.

      • willCollideVerticallyWithBlock

        public static float willCollideVerticallyWithBlock​(MovingDirectionalMapObject object)
        Checks whether or not a MovingDirectionalMapObject will collide vertically with any block on the map within the next frame (between its current position and its current position + velocity) Takes the moving object as a parameter and returns the y velocity it must move within the next frame in order to not clip into or through a block. If, within the next frame, the moving directional map object will not collide with any block, its regular velocity is returned.

      • willCollideVerticallyWithPlayer

        public static float willCollideVerticallyWithPlayer​(MovingDirectionalMapObject object)
        Checks whether or not a MovingDirectionalMapObject will collide vertically with either of the players on the map within the next frame (between its current position and its current position + velocity) Takes the moving object as a parameter and returns the y velocity it must move within the next frame in order to not clip into or through a player. If, within the next frame, the moving directional map object will not collide with either player, its regular velocity is returned.

      • willCollideHorizontallyWithObject

        public static float willCollideHorizontallyWithObject​(MovingDirectionalMapObject object)
        Checks whether or not a MovingDirectionalMapObject will collide horizontally with either of the players or blocks on the map within the next frame (between its current position and its current position + velocity) Takes the moving object as a parameter and returns the x velocity it must move within the next frame in order to not clip into or through a player or block. If, within the next frame, the moving directional map object will not collide with either player or block, its regular velocity is returned.

      • willCollideVerticallyWithObject

        public static float willCollideVerticallyWithObject​(MovingDirectionalMapObject object)
        Checks whether or not a MovingDirectionalMapObject will collide vertically with either of the players or blocks on the map within the next frame (between its current position and its current position + velocity)
        Parameters:
        object - the moving object
        Returns:
        returns the y velocity it must move within the next frame in order to not clip into or through a player or block. If, within the next frame, the moving directional map object will not collide with either player or block, its regular velocity is returned.
